ANY IMPERFECTIONS VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES AND MISSED IN THE DESCRIPTION MUST BE IGNOREDSHIPPINGITEMS WITH FREE SHIPPING ARE SHIPPED THROUGH REGISTERED AIRMAIL SIGNATURE DELIVERY WHICH TAKES ABOUT 3 TO 5 WEEKS. PLEASE BE PATIENT AS WE ARE ON THE MERCY OF THE POSTAL DEPARTMENT AFTER SHIPPING. FREE COMBINE SHIPPING UPTO 4 ITEMSWE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DELAYS IN DELIVERY DUE TO CUSTOM CLEARANCE OF THE BUYER'S COUNTRY AS IT IS TO BE HANDLED BY THE BUYER HIMSELF.INTERNATIONAL BUYERS PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR PHONE NUMBERS FOR PROMPT AND QUICK DELIVERY.PAYMENTSPAYMENTS SHOULD BE CLEARED WITHIN 4 DAYS OF SALE END AND WE PREFER PAYPAL. FOR ANY OTHER PAYMENT METHOD PLEASE CONTACT US.RETURN POLICYIN ANY CIRCUMSTANCES IF YOU WISH TO RETURN THE ITEM, THE RETURN SHIPPING WILL BE BEAR BY THE BUYER HIMSELF/HERSELF AND THE REFUND WILL ONLY BE ISSUED ONCE WE RECEIVE THE PRODUCT BACK. WE ARE ONLY LIABLE TO SEND ANY REPLACEMENT WATCH/PART IN CASE CUSTOMER RECEIVES DEFECTIVE/DAMAGED ITEM HOWEVER, OUR LIABILITY IS LIMITED DEPENDING ON THE SITUATION. PLEASE BID/BUY ONLY IF YOU AGREE WITH THE FOLLOWING TERMS.CONTACT USFOR ANY QUERIES OR CONCERNS PLEASE EMAIL US THROUGH eBay, WILL BE ANSWERED WITHIN 48 HOURS WITH FULL SINCERITY.FEEDBACK PLEASE LEAVE US POSITIVE FEEDBACK IF YOU ARE SATISFIED, AND IF YOU ARE HAPPY WITH THE SERVICE, AS WELL AS WILL ALSO DO THE SAME FOR YOU. PLEASE DO CONTACT US BEFORE LEAVING ANY NEGATIVE FEEDBACK OR FILLING ANY DISPUTE. HOPE YOU UNDERSTAND NEGATIVE FEEDBACK IS NOT THE BEST WAY TO SOLVE ANY PROBLEM. WE WILL DO OUR BEST TO RESOLVE ANY ISSUE, BECAUSE CUSTOMERS COME FIRST. IF YOU HAVE ANY CONCERN, PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US VIA EBAY.OUR GOAL IS 100% CUSTOMER'S SATISFACTION.AFTER SALEGREATEST ACHIEVEMENT FOR US IS TO SATISFY OUR CUSTOMER. IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM REGARDING YOUR PURCHASE PLEASE CONTACT US AND YOUR QUERY WILL BE ANSWERED ON PRIORITY BASIS.THANKS
